entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLink: RUC on derived virtual should not warn if base class has RUC #108090
    10.0.0
  • WinUI3 app compiled as AOT publishes managed pdb instead of native #108087
  • Trim analysis doesn't track AssemblyQualifiedName of a known type #108082
    10.0.0
  • Excessive context switching in FreeBSD dotnet ThreadPool worker threads #108079
  • `chrome-DebuggerTests` timing out #108078
    10.0.0
  • Test build failure: "coreclr Common Pri1 Test Build AnyOS AnyCPU checked" CI job fails #108076
  • The PipeWriter 'ResponseBodyPipeWriter' does not implement PipeWriter.UnflushedBytes #108075
  • WasmTemplateTests.RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations timeout #108074
    10.0.0
  • Include System.IO.Compression.Native in the PGO training set #108073
  • [wasm] DebuggerTests.Inspector.OpenSessionAsync #108072
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] DebuggerTests.WasmHostProvider.LaunchHostAsync #108071
    10.0.0
  • System.Data.Common.Tests Assert failure on Linx x64 CI test run #108070
  • [aot] mono_aot_split_options handles \ incorrectly #108066
    10.0.0
  • Arm64 HWIntrinsics: Immediate methods should be testing with non-constants #108060
    10.0.0
  • Performance degradation in .Net 9 #108058
  • Updating to .net 6 causes higher lock contention #108057
  • [API Proposal]: MinSafeInteger and MaxSafeInteger constants for System.Single and System.Double #108055
  • Confusing API for taking items from BlockingCollection #108054
  • Access Violation in CastHelpers.IsInstanceOfInterface #108052
  • Exception event missing from activity in HttpClient native instrumentation #108050
  • Safely receiving bool return value from C++ using unmanaged delegate in C# #108047
  • `UnsafeAccessor` works with AOT but does not work with JIT for a type of Class<float> shape #108046

Closed

  • [profiler] It doesn't seem to be possible to get information about generic arguments of the defining class of a function from JIT compilation callbacks #107139
    10.0.0
  • Mono / .NET based Program crashing, won't start #108069
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 16 Regressions on 8/28/2024 6:34:28 PM #107302
    9.0.0
  • [9.0] PosixSignalRegistrationTests.ExternalConsoleManipulation_RegistrationRemoved_UnregisterSucceeds test crash #107412
    9.0.0
  • List<T>.Find() slower than System.Linq.FirstOrDefault() #108064
  • [Fuzzing] AssemblyNameInfoFuzzer: CultureNotFoundException: Culture is not supported #107949
    9.0.0
  • JsonElement.ToString() returns invalid json: "True"/"False" #107998
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'endOffset > startOffset' during 'Emit GC+EH tables' #106379
    10.0.0
  • Custom format strings with section separators have weird behavior #27472
  • Runtime doesn't utilize available Ram and crashes #102332
  • Memory footprint decreases when application is launched as a console, but does not when launched through a Windows service #96179

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-rc2] dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108091
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108088
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Consider workload band versions stable when we are at rtm #108085
    area-Build-mono, area-Workloads, 10.0.0
  • Remove support for emitting and loading Itanium-64 assemblies #108084
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Add sampling profiler #108083
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Give more detail on RyuJIT porting #108080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Testing #108077
    needs-area-label
  • [aot] mono_aot_split_options: reset state after a backslash #108067
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Stored the initial capacity of the ConcurrentDictionary for correctly sizing the backing array after clearing the collection. #108065
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix partial compilation for CETCOMPAT mode #108062
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] improve local diagnostic of AOT enabled build #108059
    area-Build-mono
  • Add support for (experimental) profile-based trimming #108049
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL define #108048
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • InlineArray design spec/doc #108044
    documentation, needs-area-label

Merged

  • dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108045
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve Random{NumberGenerator}.GetItems/String for non-power of 2 choices #107988
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [Profiler] Update GetFunctionInfo2 to have a decent default ClassID #107753
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Treat -rtm as stable sdk version band #107997
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, area-Workloads
  • fix broken comment in BitOperations.cs #108056
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Visit blocks in RPO during LSRA #107927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Warn on instrumenting unsupported types for the Fuzzer #108030
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • [PERF] Fix the perf r2rRunType and pgoRunType argument formats for new flow #108038
    area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up the notes on experimental APIs to simplify for maintenance #107959
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • Modernize C# generation tools under coreclr/inc #106719
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Align the ELF relocation type. #108051
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Handle CultureNotFoundException in AssemblyNameInfoFuzzer #108053
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [NRBF] Remove array allocation when decoding `decimal`s. #107797
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable codeql on official builds #108041
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Fix `emitter::emitSplit` to not create zero-sized method fragment #107568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run our CI source-build legs on CentOS Stream 9 #108042
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Allow un-examining in PipeReader.AdvanceTo(...) #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix reporting illegal instruction exception #107414
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Enable GC double reporting detection #107986
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Make sure we can build with DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT not defined #107108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve OOM kill message #108039
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Run new block layout only in backend #107634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • ARM64: Fix lsra for AdvSimd_LoadAndInsertScalar #107786
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: run a late pass of empty try/finally/fault removal #108003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing params to WhenEach overloads #107964
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [RISC-V] Disable robust mutexes in PAL on Qemu #106123
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [workload] Fix the SDK band version and base the WBT on the sdk flow #107899
    needs-area-label
  • [WASI][draft] UnsupportedOSPlatformAttribute on the API surface #107185
    api-needs-work, arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix typo #108022
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Swift interop] Add inline array struct lowering tests #107859
    area-Interop-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Fix typo `ConcatinatedString` -> `ConcatenatedString` #108033
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-rc2] [browser] Fix custom icu fingerprinting. #108025
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
